name: Add and Update Sensorpro contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time when you search Sensorpro contacts, Make will automatically add that contacts to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet or update an existing row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1B3TkvDrZPWeEerrfp3jRLk7VBAob59O9UQQa0vU1yH0/edit?usp=sharing).
